snippet: Major League Soccer is negotiating to locate its 20th franchise in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park as its first New York City team.
abstract: Officials of Major League Soccer are negotiating to locate a 20th franchise in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, in what would be New York City's first professional soccer team; new stadium would hold about 25,000 spectators and construction would create more than 2,000 temporary jobs and 300 permanent ones; proposed team does not yet have a name or an owner.
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer is negotiating to locate its 20th franchise in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park as its first New York City team.

headline.seo: Major League Soccer Plans a Team and a Stadium in Queens
headline.main: Soccer Enthusiasts Hope for a Stadium and a Pro Team in Queens
headline.print_headline: Soccer Enthusiasts Hope For a Stadium in Queens
